name: The Savior (ungaberattar)
description:
Imagine being bored and fiending to play a game of adventure, The Savior is the ideal option.

Your friend is kidnaped by unknown beings and your job is to free him.

You start by waking up in a room and learning that your friend has been taken prisoner within a large dungeon. The exciting search then begins.

A game where you finish obstacle courses and a labyrinth to save a captured friend by the help of guides who are perfected suited for the environment such as a hunter in a forest, caveman in a cave etc.

The game is in first person with easy controls for pcs and laptops.

As I said earlier.  Experiencing adventures and having fun is a major key to a good game which “The savior” provides with ease.
